changelog:
Version 1.1.0 Updates

New Features:
- UI Scale setting (75-200%) for improved accessibility
- Redesigned home page with module cards and quick tips
- Update status display on home page
- Theme-aware icons that adapt to light/dark mode

Improvements:
- Better dark mode text contrast
- Improved icon scaling with UI scale
- Enhanced settings page organization

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed sidebar icon scaling issues
- Improved theme switching reliability
